com.artifexiumgames.apirateslife.effect

Class FadeInFadeOutEffectArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artifexiumgames.apirateslife.effect.Effect
      • com.artifexiumgames.apirateslife.effect.FadeInFadeOutEffectArea

  • public class FadeInFadeOutEffectArea
extends Effect
    This class is for creating an area effect of many sprites fading in and fading out around an entity.
    Author:
    Adam Torres Created 5/27/2016.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FadeInFadeOutEffectArea

        public FadeInFadeOutEffectArea(Entity entity,
                               com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite,
                               int fadeDelay,
                               int distanceFromEntity,
                               int numberOfEffects,
                               int numberOfRepeats)
        Creates an effect of MANY sprites around a SINGLE entity that fade in then fade out using TweenManager and Tween. The TweenManager simply modifies the alpha value of the sprite using SpriteAccessor. This effect is based off an Entity and will display effects around the Entity in a circle given radius distanceFromEntity. The number of effects displayed around the entity is limited only by the hardware of the machine the code is running on.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity the effects will be displayed around
        sprite - The sprite from which the effect is drawn
        fadeDelay - The amount of time in seconds the fade should take place in
        distanceFromEntity - The maximum distance from the entity the effects can be drawn at
        numberOfEffects - The number of effects to be drawn around the entity
        See Also:
        Entity, Sprite, Tween, TweenManager

    • Method Detail

      • animate

        public void animate(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                    float delta)
        Animates the effect. This is done using TweenManager. The TweenManger changes the alpha value of the given sprite using SpriteAccessor. This method should be called before it's target entity is drawn to avoid the animations being drawn over the entity.
        Specified by:
        animate in class Effect
        Parameters:
        batch - the SpriteBatch the animation will be drawn to
        delta - the time between the last frame and the current frame

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes the texture used in the animation
        Specified by:
        dispose in class Effect
        See Also:
        Texture, Sprite
